participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

tfmri_rec_all_beh_negface_br.Description: Response bias for negative faces computed as (tfmri_rec_all_beh_new.neg.face_fa/(1-(tfmri_rec_all_beh_old.neg.face_hr - tfmri_rec_all_beh_new.neg.face_fa)))  - 0.5

tfmri_rec_all_beh_negf_dp.Description: D-prime computed as norminv(tfmri_rec_all_beh_old.neg.face_hr) - norminv(tfmri_rec_all_beh_new.neg.face_fa); norminv normal inverse cumulative distribution function; in case of hr or fa equal to 0 or 1, use 1/(2N) for 0 and (1 - 1/(2N)) for 1; N total number of trials

tfmri_rec_all_beh_negface_pr.Description: Corrected accuracy for negative faces computed as tfmri_rec_all_beh_old.neg.face_hr-tfmri_rec_all_beh_new.neg.face_fa

tfmri_rec_all_beh_neutface_br.Description: Response bias for neutral faces computed as (tfmri_rec_all_beh_new.neut.face_fa/(1-(tfmri_rec_all_beh_old.neut.face_hr - tfmri_rec_all_beh_new.neut.face_fa)))  - 0.5

tfmri_rec_all_beh_neutf_dp.Description: D-prime computed as norminv(tfmri_rec_all_beh_old.pos.face_hr) - norminv(tfmri_rec_all_beh_new.pos.face_fa); norminv normal inverse cumulative distribution function; in case of hr or fa equal to 0 or 1, use 1/(2N) for 0 and (1 - 1/(2N)) for 1; N total number of trials

tfmri_rec_all_beh_neutface_pr.Description: Corrected accuracy for neutral faces computed as tfmri_rec_all_beh_old.neut.face_hr-tfmri_rec_all_beh_new.neut.face_fa

tfmri_rec_all_beh_newnegf_fa.Description: False alarm of new negative faces shown

tfmri_rec_all_beh_newnegf_hr.Description: Hit rate of new negative face correctly recognized

tfmri_rec_all_beh_newnf_fa.Description: False alarm of new neutral faces shown

tfmri_rec_all_beh_newnf_hr.Description: Hit rate of new neutral faces correctly recognized

tfmri_rec_all_beh_newpl_fa.Description: False alarm of new place shown

tfmri_rec_all_beh_newpl_hr.Description: Hit rate of new place correctly recognized

tfmri_rec_all_beh_newposf_fa.Description: False alarm of new positive faces shown

tfmri_rec_all_beh_newposf_hr.Description: Hit rate of new positive face correctly recognized

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldnegf_fa.Description: False alarm of negative faces shown in the n-back task

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldnegf_hr.Description: Hit rate of negative faces shown in the N-back task correctly recognized

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldnegf0b_fa.Description: False alarm of positive faces shown in the n-back task and in a 0-back block

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldnegf0b_hr.Description: Hit rate of negative faces shown in the n-back task and in a 0-back block correctly recognized

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldnegf2b_fa.Description: False alarm of negative faces shown in the n-back task and in a 2-back block

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldnegf2b_hr.Description: Hit rate of negative faces shown in the n-back task and in a 2-back block correctly recognized

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldnf_fa.Description: False alarm of neutral faces shown in the n-back task

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldnf_hr.Description: Hit rate of neutral faces shown in the N-back task correctly recognized

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldnf0b_fa.Description: False alarm of neutral faces shown in the n-back task and in a 0-back block

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldnf0b_hr.Description: Hit rate of neutral faces shown in the n-back task and in a 0-back block correctly recognized

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldnf2b_fa.Description: False alarm of neutral faces shown in the n-back task and in a 2-back block

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldnf2b_hr.Description: Hit rate of neutral faces shown in the n-back task and in a 2-back block correctly recognized

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldpl_fa.Description: False alarm of places shown in the n-back task

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldpl_hr.Description: Hit rate of places shown in the N-back task correctly recognized

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldpl0b_fa.Description: False alarm of placesshown in the n-back task and in a 0-back block

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldpl0b_hr.Description: Hit rate of places shown in the n-back task and in a 0-back block correctly recognized

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldpl2b_fa.Description: False alarm of placesshown in the n-back task and in a 2-back block

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldpl2b_hr.Description: Hit rate of places shown in the n-back task and in a 2-back block correctly recognized

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldposf_fa.Description: False alarm of positive faces shown in the n-back task

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldposf_hr.Description: Hit rate of positive faces shown in the N-back task correctly recognized

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldposf0b_fa.Description: False alarm of positive faces shown in the n-back task and in a 0-back block

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldposf0b_hr.Description: Hit rate of positive faces shown in the n-back task and in a 0-back block correctly recognized

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldposf2b_fa.Description: False alarm of positive faces shown in the n-back task and in a 2-back block

tfmri_rec_all_beh_oldposf2b_hr.Description: Hit rate of positive faces shown in the n-back task and in a 2-back block correctly recognized

tfmri_rec_all_beh_place_br.Description: Response bias for places computed as (tfmri_rec_all_beh_new.place_fa/(1-(tfmri_rec_all_beh_old.place_hr-tfmri_rec_all_beh_new.place_fa)))  - 0.5

tfmri_rec_all_beh_place_dp.Description: D-prime computed as norminv(tfmri_rec_all_beh_old.neg.face_hr) - norminv(tfmri_rec_all_beh_new.place_fa); norminv normal inverse cumulative distribution function; in case of hr or fa equal to 0 or 1, use 1/(2N) for 0 and (1 - 1/(2N)) for 1; N total number of trials

tfmri_rec_all_beh_place_pr.Description: Corrected accuracy for places computed as tfmri_rec_all_beh_old.place_hr-tfmri_rec_all_beh_new.place_fa

tfmri_rec_all_beh_posface_br.Description: Response bias for positive faces computed as (tfmri_rec_all_beh_new.pos.face_fa/(1-(tfmri_rec_all_beh_old.pos.face_hr - tfmri_rec_all_beh_new.pos.face_fa)))  - 0.5

tfmri_rec_all_beh_posf_dpr.Description: D-prime computed as norminv(tfmri_rec_all_beh_old.pos.face_hr) - norminv(tfmri_rec_all_beh_new.pos.face_fa); norminv normal inverse cumulative distribution function; in case of hr or fa equal to 0 or 1, use 1/(2N) for 0 and (1 - 1/(2N)) for 1; N total number of trials

tfmri_rec_all_beh_posface_pr.Description: Corrected accuracy for positive faces computed as tfmri_rec_all_beh_old.pos.face_hr-tfmri_rec_all_beh_new.pos.face_fa

tfmri_rec_beh_switchflag.Description: Whether the button box responses were switched
